I'm a robotics working at the intersection of AI/ML, control theory and distributed systems.

I attended the University of Messina for my undergraduate studies and returned there for my Research Fellowship.

I also hold degrees from University of Genova and Ecole Centrale de Nantes where I studied under an ERASMUS Mundus scholarship program and I completed my PhD.

I'm currently a Research Fellow of Future Computing Research Laboratory of University of Messina, where I currently follow research path in Distributed Learning, Physics-Informed Machine Learning and Clinical Data modeling.
